Title: Grants local social services districts access to criminal history information when acting within the scope of their duties under the social services law or the family court act
Summary: Grants local social services districts access to criminal history information when acting within the scope of their duties under the social services law or the family court act.
LawCode: Amd §835, Exec L; amd §§398 & 424, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the social services law, in relation to access to court databases for local social services districts
